hibernate-mapping.query: select order from sail.beans.entity.BatWorkOrder order where order.workordertype = ? and order.sysflag = '1'
select order from sail.beans.entity.BatWorkOrder order where order.workordercode = ? and order.sysflag = '1'
select order from sail.beans.entity.BatWorkOrderInput order where order.matbatch = ? and order.sysflag = '1'

select detail from sail.beans.entity.BatWorkOrderInput detail, sail.beans.entity.BatWorkOrder order where order.pid = detail.workorderpid and order.workordercode = ? and order.sysflag = '1' and detail.sysflag = '1'
